import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Header from './../../components/Pos/Header'; import Tabs from '../../components/Pos/Tabs'; import * as action from '../../actions/index'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; class Pos extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); } showMenu = (menus, id) => { var result = null; var style = {width : '100px'} if(menus.length > 0) { result = menus.map((menu,index) => { return ( {index+1} {menu.IdMenu} {menu.NameMenu}
{menu.Price} ); }) } return result }; render() { return (
